meanings.definition: A device or chamber in which combustion takes place.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic inspected the combustor to ensure it was functioning properly.
meanings.sent2: The combustor in the engine ignited the fuel to generate power.
meanings.sent3: The little robot mistook the combustor for a tiny fireplace and tried to roast marshmallows over it.
meanings.sent4: Her passion was a combustor, fueling her drive to succeed against all odds.
meanings.sent5: The combustor roared to life, engulfing the room in warmth and light.

meanings.definition: One who or that which combusts.
meanings.sent1: The firefighter bravely faced the combustor to extinguish the flames.
meanings.sent2: The arsonist was identified as the combustor responsible for the fire.
meanings.sent3: The toaster was acting like a mischievous combustor, burning every slice of bread.
meanings.sent4: His temper was a combustor, erupting in fiery outbursts when provoked.
meanings.sent5: The sun, a natural combustor, bathed the earth in its warm rays.
